https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bSZTNGhhQxDRaxzWsxnzo7UPC9l.jpg Would you like to travel to the world behind the mirror? A behind-the-scenes look at the special episode of "Bia: A World Upside Down", where the universe of the series is turned upside down. We will take a look at the challenge of creating totally different characters, looks, dialogues and new situations, plus all the work and fun of the shoot. BIA: An Upside Down World - Making of
